headline: Verizon Launches Government Cloud-Managed SD WAN to Accelerate Federal Agency Modernization
summary: WASHINGTON, April 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon today announced the launch of its first Government Cloud-Managed Software Defined Wide Area Network (SD WAN) product. Built on Verizon’s Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP) High Ready Government Cloud Platform for U.S. federal agencies, the new offering is highlighted by the platform’s first SaaS Managed SD WAN solution. This innovative offering, already FedRAMP High Ready and built to NIST 800-53 controls, provides F

headline: A tale of 2 consumers: High earners doing fine while lower-income households 'under some pressure'
summary: Despite stock market volatility and tariff uncertainty, the US consumer is still spending. But earnings commentary and Wall Street data point to increasing cautiousness, especially for lower-income households.
